data.comment: The big names in today's match at Inter Miami CF Stadium have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
In the minute 3, Free kick New York City.
Alexandru Mitrita scores to make it 0-1 at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Alexander Ring instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for New York City at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Gonzalo Higuain of Miami smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
In the minute 7, Miami pushes forward through Wil Trapp, whose finish on goal is saved.
New York City are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Miami.
In the minute 11, New York City needs to be cautious. Miami have an attacking throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
Throw-in for Miami in the half of New York City.
In the minute 12, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Miami.
Miami surge into the attack at Inter Miami CF Stadium but Leandro Gonzalez Pirezâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 14, Goal kick for New York City at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
In Fort Lauderdale a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Miami in the half of New York City.
In the minute 18, Important block from the New York City defence as Gonzalo Higuain fires in a strike for Miami.
Can Miami capitalize from this throw-in deep inside New York City's half?
Throw-in New York City.
In the minute 20, Jair Marrufo awards New York City a goal kick.
New York City have a goal kick.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to New York City.
In the minute 25, Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
Leandro Gonzalez Pirez (Miami) has received a yellow card from Jair Marrufo.
Goal! Miami go level at 1-1 through Lewis Morgan in Fort Lauderdale.
In the minute 27, Victor Ulloa with an assist there.
Can New York City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Miami's half?
New York City's Keaton Parks gets in a shot on goal at Inter Miami CF Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 30, New York City have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fort Lauderdale.
Miami have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 34, Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
At Inter Miami CF Stadium, New York City are penalized for being offside.
Jair Marrufo signals a New York City throw-in in Miami's half.
In the minute 35, Anton Tinnerholm is on target to give New York City a 1-2 advantage.
That's a fine assist from Alexander Ring.
Corner awarded to Miami.
In the minute 38, Miami to take a throw-in in New York City territory.
Goal! The home team draw level at 2-2 through Lewis Morgan.
Great play from Gonzalo Higuain to set up the goal.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Miami in their own half.
In Fort Lauderdale a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Miami's Rodolfo Pizarro breaks free at Inter Miami CF Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 40, Jair Marrufo awards New York City a goal kick.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Corner awarded to Miami.
In the minute 43, Goal! Alexandru Mitrita gives New York City a 2-3 lead.
Great play from Alexander Ring to set up the goal.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Fort Lauderdale.
In the minute 45, In Fort Lauderdale, Lewis Morgan of Miami is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Miami.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fort Lauderdale.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 47, Wil Trapp (Miami) gets a yellow card.
Ball safe as New York City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 51, Gonzalo Higuain's header is off-target for Miami.
Goal kick for New York City at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Free kick for Miami in the half of New York City.
In the minute 55, Free kick for New York City in their own half.
Free kick Miami.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Miami.
In the minute 59, Free kick New York City.
New York City's Ronald Matarrita gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Miami have a goal kick.
In the minute 61, New York City's Alexander Ring misses with an attempt on goal.
Miami have a goal kick.
Can New York City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Miami's half?
In the minute 62, Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
Miami push forward at Inter Miami CF Stadium and Lewis Morgan gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined New York City defence.
In the minute 67, Miami have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
In the minute 67, The home team have replaced A.J. DeLaGarza with Dylan Nealis. This is the second substitution made today by Diego Alonso.
Matias Pellegrini is on a sub for Wil Trapp for Miami.
Can Miami capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Lewis Morgan for Miami gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 68, Jair Marrufo awards New York City a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Miami in the half of New York City.
Ismael Tajouri is replacing Alexandru Mitrita for the away team.
Ronny Deila (New York City) is making a second substitution, with Gary Mackay Steven replacing Jesus Medina.
Free kick for Miami in the half of New York City.
In the minute 71, Corner awarded to Miami.
Jair Marrufo signals a Miami throw-in in New York City's half.
The home team replace Ben Sweat with Brek Shea.
Matias Pellegrini for Miami has been booked by Jair Marrufo and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 75, In Fort Lauderdale a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sebastien Ibeagha (New York City) has received a first yellow card.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
In the minute 77, Jair Marrufo awards the home team a throw-in.
New York City drives forward and Keaton Parks gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fort Lauderdale.
In the minute 82, Valentin Castellanos of New York City gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Miami goal kick.
New York City to take a throw-in in Miami territory.
In the minute 83, New York City make their third substitution with Tony Rocha replacing Keaton Parks.
Miami awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gary Mackay Steven (New York City) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 84, Free kick for New York City in the half of Miami.
Diego Alonso is making the team's fourth substitution at Inter Miami CF Stadium with Julian Carranza replacing Victor Ulloa.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Free kick Miami.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to New York City.
At Inter Miami CF Stadium the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
In Fort Lauderdale a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Miami.
Maxime Chanot is back on his feet again.
New York City are caught offside.
Goal kick for New York City at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Jair Marrufo blows to end the match. The final score is 2-3.
Maxime Chanot (New York City) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Gary Mackay Steven is booked for the away team.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Maxime Chanot.
Joe Scally is replacing Ronald Matarrita for New York City at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
